text:
An unidentified woman was found dumped in a charred state near Errahalli bus stand in Kaveripattinam on Monday.

The victim, suspected to have been in her mid-20s, is believed to have been murdered and dumped in a gunny bag, after which the bag was set ablaze. The charred remains of the victim were sent for autopsy.

Superintendent of Police Thirunavukkarasu visited the spot. The police are also scouting for information on missing women reported in police stations in Krishnagiri and Dharmapuri.
title: Charred remains of woman found
